text: This is a list of the episodes of an animated cartoon children's Television program 64 Zoo Lane. ==Series overview== ==Original Series== ===Pilot (1994)=== ===Series 1 (1999)=== * Note 1: This is the first season to be in the traditionally animated. * Note 2: This is the only season to use in the cel animation. ===Series 2 (2000)=== * Note 1: This is the last season to be in the traditionally animated. * Note 2: This is the only season to use in a digital ink-and-paint animation. ==Reboot Series== ===Series 3 (2008)=== * Note 1: This is the first season to be animated in the Adobe Flash format using Adobe Animate. * Note 2: This is the first season is used in the British English version. ===Series 4 (2012)=== * Note 1: This is the last season to be animated in the Adobe Flash format using Adobe Animate. * Note 2: This is the last season is used in the British English version. 64 Zoo Lane
title: List of 64 Zoo Lane episodes
